oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Manuel Eskind proclamation, 1961 September 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nashville Mayor Ben West presented civic leader Manuel Eskind with an official proclamation on September 25th, 1961, for his “outstanding service in civic affairs of this community.” Eskind was a successful businessman and a philanthropist. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Eskind, Manuel; West, Ben, 1911-1974
